title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Tax Day. Chauvin takes 5th in George Floyd trial. Geraldo explodes in TV debate. Marxist BLM co-founder says criticizing her purchase of 5 homes is terrorism and racism. Continued BLM rioting encouraged by Democrats. Rush analyzing one of Biden's typically ignorant comments on how cops should try to shoot suspects in the leg instead of the heart. Daunte Wright made bad decision to resist arrest, cop who shot him to blame as well, should pay price. Democrats move forward with plans to pack the court just as Rush warned us they would. Tom Cotton on court packing. Liberal Justice Stephen Breyer warns against court packing. Police officer calls in to share her insights on how horrible accidents and mistakes happen without regard to race. Why are criminals never put under the media microscope like cops? Rush runs through list of Democrat assaults on the Constitution.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Rush drops a truth bomb: African-Americans want more cops, not less, think their local law-enforcement officials do a good job. Project Veritas catches CNN employee admitting they hyped covid death rate for politics, ratings, as Rush told us they were doing. Democrats never let a crisis go to waste, use police shootings, covid overreach to grab power. Court packing. Covid passports for NFL games? Biden administration says they don't have the time or resources to covid test illegal immigrants. Court packing. Kathryn will be back on the program tomorrow to announce another Great American Business Award.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Biden administration uses covid as excuse to promote abortion drugs. Rush on why the Democrat Party is hell-bent on more abortions. Rush on the left targeting the American founding, masculinity. Kamala Harris says climate change is causing the crisis at the border. Rush on how the Drive-By Media covers up for Dems. Definition of woke. EIB High Note: Girl surprised with pet dragon after surviving cancer and Making-a-Wish. Eight states have limited governor's emergency powers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
